detail_desc: Cap in woven fabric with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a felted wool blend with peak lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Short skirt in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with an elasticated waist that has a small frill trim at the top. Lined.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Strappy top in a sturdy, textured knit with a V-neck front and back.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Round-neck jumper in an airy, fine-knit viscose blend containing glittery threads. Long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.

prod_name: CA Hugh Linen shirt TVP R
detail_desc: Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a turn-down collar and open chest pocket.
Short, gently fitted dress in sequined mesh with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Raw edge at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Boat-necked blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, tie-hem sleeves and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and small bow at the front. Overlocked, crinkled edges at the hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, hard-worn sections and neon-coloured details.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in cotton poplin with smocking at the top and a sewn-on bow at the back. Long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. One chain is decorated with small bead pendants and the other has a pendant with plastic stone. Adjustable length approx. 42-33 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, button placket and rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a high, ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Small umbrella with a telescopic handle and a fabric wrist strap. Size 7x15.5 cm folded.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with embroidery. at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

Small backpack in a patterned weave with a handle and zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps. Outer compartment with a hook and loop fastening and a padded back plate and base. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in woven fabric with elastication at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves with grosgrain trims down the sides. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in fine-knit cotton with a wrapover hood, terry motif on the front and short slits at the hem. Contrasting colour ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Small, glittery shoulder bag with appliqués and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 3x7x11 cm.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered pattern, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour cap with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastener at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit.
Top in printed cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumpsuit in viscose jersey with cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and narrow elastication at the hems.

Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a small frilled collar and cuffs in a broderie anglaise cotton weave. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a seam at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a curved hem.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Knee-length cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top, skirt and small shoulder bag in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long-sleeved top with reversible sequins on the front (except in size 2-3Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Flared, patterned skirt with an elasticated waist. Bag with a sequined motif and embroidery on the front, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a hook and loop fastening at one end. Lined. Size of bag 11.5x13 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey vest tops with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with press-studs, and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in size 4-12M.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Pleated skirt in satin with diagonal seams at the top. Concealed zip with a hook-and-eye fastener in the side seam, and a laser-cut hem.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the top and woven fabric edges with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Metal hair clips in the shape of butterflies. Clip size approx. 2.8 cm.
Short dress in jacquard-patterned jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Jersey lining.
5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Knee-length dress in patterned silk with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, gathered sleeves with a slit and ties at the ends, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Rectangular waist bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and adjustable waist strap. One outer compartment and one inner compartment, both with a zip. Lined. Size 4x15x27 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless body in pleated, shimmering jersey with a V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck, gentle gathers at the shoulders and a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch. Lined front.
Shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, chunky-knit jumper in sturdy cotton with a small stand-up collar with a roll edge, long, wide trumpet sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Sandals in cotton canvas with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Straight-style vest top in soft jersey with a round neckline and visible seam down the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist and a zip fly and button.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal earrings and stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from approx. 0.3 cm to 2.5 cm.
Cropped top in heavy jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and chin guard at the front. Chest pocket with a flap and press-stud, front pockets with a waterproof zip, an adjustable elasticated waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced legs and back, reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and hook and loop tab. Fixed, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in fabric made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Pre-tied bow ties in woven fabric. Elastic at the back of the neck with an adjustable plastic fastener. Width 10 cm.
